name: bnj132
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: bitri(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)), wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wi(w1, wex(s0, w2)))
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
